listitem.para: If you use RLTP together with non-reliable disk-buffer, it is possible to lose logs. When sending logs through a relay that is using a non-reliable disk-buffer, it is possible to lose logs if the relay crashes.
When sending logs through a relay that is using a non-reliable disk-buffer, it is possible that logs are duplicated if the relay crashes, or it is stopped.
If the underlying disk system of &abbrev; fails to write the log messages to the disk, but it does not return a write error.
